speaker: Customer
text: Yes, this is Alex. Who's calling?

speaker: Agent
text: Hi Alex, I'm Laura from XYZ Collections. I'm calling regarding your account. Can I please verify your date of birth?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you, Alex. Now, can you please confirm your address for me?

speaker: Agent
text: Thank you for that information. You currently have an outstanding balance of $250 on your account. Would you like to discuss payment options?

speaker: Customer
text: Yes, I would like to know how I can pay it off.

speaker: Agent
text: You can pay online via our website or set up a payment plan if that works better for you.

speaker: Customer
text: I think I'll pay online today.

speaker: Agent
text: Great choice! I will send you an email with the payment link shortly.

speaker: Agent
text: You're welcome, Alex. Have a great day!
